mapper.select: SELECT serial_no FROM material ma JOIN v_model mdl ON ma.model_id = mdl.MODEL_ID WHERE fix_type = 6 AND break_back_flg = 0 AND inline_time IS NOT NULL AND outline_time IS NULL AND serial_no LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%') ORDER by serial_no DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ma.material_id, ma.serial_no, ma.model_id, mdl.NAME as model_name, mdl.category_name, 0 as expedited, 0 as waitingat FROM material ma JOIN v_model mdl ON ma.model_id = mdl.MODEL_ID WHERE fix_type = 6 AND ticket_flg = 1 AND inline_time IS NULL AND section_id = #{section_id} ORDER by serial_no asc

SELECT `plan_date`, dpp.`model_id`, mdl.name as model_name, `seq`, `quantity` FROM `daily_product_plan` dpp JOIN model mdl ON dpp.model_id = mdl.model_id WHERE `plan_date` between current_date and date_add(current_date, interval 14 day) ORDER by `plan_date` asc, `seq`;
